float4.h

00001 #ifndef _MATH_FLOAT4_H
00002 #define _MATH_FLOAT4_H

00005 #include <lang/pp.h>
00006 #include <math/float.h>
00007 #include <xmath.h>

00009 
00010 #ifdef PLATFORM_PS2
00011 
00012     #define MATH_ALIGN_128 __attribute__ ((aligned(16)))
00013 #else
00014     #define MATH_ALIGN_128
00015 #endif

00018 BEGIN_NAMESPACE(math) 
00019

00021 class float2;
00022 class float3;
00023 
00024 
00034 class float4
00035 {
00036 public:
00038     MATH_ALIGN_128 float        x;
00039     
00041     float       y;
00042     
00044     float       z;
00045     
00047     float       w;
00048 
00049 #ifdef _DEBUG
00050 
00051     float4()                                                                        {w=z=y=x=getNaN();}
00052 #else
00053     float4()                                                                        {}
00054 #endif
00055     
00057     float4( float x0, float y0, float z0, float w0 )                                : x(x0), y(y0), z(z0), w(w0) {}
00058 
00060     float4( const float3& xyz0, float w0 );
00061 
00063     float4( const float2& xy0, float z0, float w0 );
00064 
00066     float4& operator+=( const float4& other )                                       {x+=other.x; y+=other.y; z+=other.z; w+=other.w; return *this;}
00067     
00069     float4& operator-=( const float4& other )                                       {x-=other.x; y-=other.y; z-=other.z; w-=other.w; return *this;}
00070     
00072     float4& operator*=( float s )                                                   {x*=s; y*=s; z*=s; w*=s; return *this;}
00073     
00075     float4& operator*=( const float4& other )                                       {x*=other.x; y*=other.y; z*=other.z; w*=other.w; return *this;}
00076 
00078     float&      operator[]( int index )                                     {return *((&x)+index);}
00079 
00081     float*      begin()                                                             {return &x;}
00082     
00084     float*      end()                                                               {return &x + 4;}
00085 
00096     void        setPlane( const float3& normal, const float3& point );
00097 
00099     float4      operator+( const float4& other ) const                              {return float4(x+other.x,y+other.y,z+other.z,w+other.w);}
00100     
00102     float4      operator-( const float4& other ) const                              {return float4(x-other.x,y-other.y,z-other.z,w-other.w);}
00103 
00105     float4      operator*( const float4& other ) const                              {return float4(x*other.x,y*other.y,z*other.z,w*other.w);}
00106 
00108     float4      operator-() const                                                   {return float4(-x,-y,-z,-w);}
00109     
00111     float4      operator*( float s ) const                                          {return float4(x*s,y*s,z*s,w*s);}
00112     
00114     const float&    operator[]( int index ) const                                   {return *((&x)+index);}
00115 
00117     bool        operator==( const float4& other ) const                             {return x==other.x && y==other.y && z==other.z && w==other.w;}
00118     
00120     bool        operator!=( const float4& other ) const                             {return x!=other.x || y!=other.y || z!=other.z || w!=other.w;}
00121 
00123     const float3& xyz() const;
00124 
00126     const float2& xy() const;
00127 
00129     float       length() const                                                      {return ::sqrtf( lengthSquared() );}
00130     
00132     float       lengthSquared() const                                               {return x*x+y*y+z*z+w*w;}
00133 
00135     const float*    begin() const                                                   {return &x;}
00136     
00138     const float*    end() const                                                     {return &x + 4;}
00139 
00141     bool            finite() const;
00142 };
00143 
00144 
00148 inline float4 operator*( float s, const float4& v )
00149 {
00150     return float4( v.x*s, v.y*s, v.z*s, v.w*s );
00151 }
00152 
00156 inline float dot( const float4& a, const float4& b )
00157 {
00158     return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z*b.z + a.w*b.w;
00159 }
00160 
00164 inline float4 normalize( const float4& v )
00165 {
00166     return v * (1.f / ::sqrtf( v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z + v.w*v.w ));
00167 }
00168 
00172 inline float4 saturate( const float4& v )
00173 {
00174     return float4( 
00175         v.x < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.x > 1.f ? 1.f : v.x),
00176         v.y < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.y > 1.f ? 1.f : v.y),
00177         v.z < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.z > 1.f ? 1.f : v.z),
00178         v.w < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.w > 1.f ? 1.f : v.w) );
00179 }
00180 
00184 inline float4 clamp( const float4& v, const float4& minv, const float4& maxv )
00185 {
00186     return float4( 
00187         v.x < minv.x ? minv.x : (v.x > maxv.x ? maxv.x : v.x),
00188         v.y < minv.y ? minv.y : (v.y > maxv.y ? maxv.y : v.y),
00189         v.z < minv.z ? minv.z : (v.z > maxv.z ? maxv.z : v.z),
00190         v.w < minv.w ? minv.w : (v.w > maxv.w ? maxv.w : v.w) );
00191 }
00192 
00196 inline float4 abs( const float4& v )
00197 {
00198     return float4( 
00199         v.x < 0.f ? -v.x : v.x,
00200         v.y < 0.f ? -v.y : v.y,
00201         v.z < 0.f ? -v.z : v.z,
00202         v.w < 0.f ? -v.w : v.w );
00203 }
00204 
00208 float4 normalize0( const float4& v );
00209

00211 END_NAMESPACE() // math
